item.description:
Pop Quiz Team Trivia at Molly Malone’s is dead. Long live Pop Quiz Team Trivia at Coat of Arms!

Help us demonstrate the intellectual superiority of liberty-minded folks—or at least the vast array of useless information we have in store!

Here’s the catch, though: teams are limited to 5 people each. Get there early (the game starts at 8) so we can make teams and try to accommodate everyone. If you get there late and a team is short-handed, you may be able to join in, but bring a thick skin just in case. If the numbers don’t work out right, you may be forced to play snooker, eat tasty pub grub, and drink really good beer instead of competing for prizes, which are usually gift certificates which can be used to pay for tasty pub grub and really good beer.
item.name: Pop Quiz at Coat of Arms
